title: Great Jazz music for Jazz lovers
text: We made reservations online for 2 events. Very happy with the music. We were not very happy with the seating arrangements since we could not do that online. I guess you have to be a local or be there in person.

title: Absolute visit
text: Lots of history and very well organized. Make sure you keep your ticket with you, individually, at all times. In case you need to switch from one section to another. Very imformative.

title: Great Sushi
text: This was our New Year's Eve treat. We enjoyed our taking away at home. Lovely and helpful staff who recommended what we should order. Excellent!

title: A Historic Point
text: Wow, what an amazing site. Looks very simple but defintely worth the time. Nice little museum with posters of nearly all olympics Worldwide. Just walking around and going up was breathtaking.

title: Down to earth
text: Nice tasty vegetarian dishes. Most of the items ate 5euros each. We has lunch here with our tour guide who introduced the place and returned back the following day. Very homey!

title: Amazing
text: Very well organized museum. After visiting acropolis it was definetely wise to visit the museum. It was a rainy day in Athens so it was perfect to be indoor. The cloakroom was a plus. A lot of history and good video to watch.

title: Must See
text: You cant be in Athens without visiting the Acropolis. My last visit was over 40 years ago and it felt like the first time visiting last Dec 2019. Wherever you are in Athens you can see the Acropolis. Beautiful sunny day and less crowded. Definetley recommend.

title: Excellent Authentic food
text: Excellent service, delicious authentic Indian food. Vegetarian is available. Good price. Highly recommend.

title: Our best day so far!
text: Walking tour with Nikos was amazing. Nikos was very informative, he explained very well to make the tour enjoyable. Paid attention to all ages and had a good sense of humor. It was paced, had time to mingle with the group, stopped for drink and even lunch. We always take free walking tours but this was exceptional. I highly recommend this tour and don’t forget to tip!
place: Nikos' Free Walking Tour in Athens

title: comfortable and safe
text: We enjoyed our flight to and from Riga with Air Baltic. Flight was on time and all went well. We also ordered food in advance which was excellent. Will definetely use Air Baltic again!

title: Excellent tour with Camilla
text: We had a wonderful time. Camilla was very informative and knowledge making this your worthwhile. Highly recommend this tour.

title: Fun
text: Something different, quite interesting and very creative. Pleasant visit. Fun for kids and adults too.

title: Unique
text: An excellent place for tea, coffee, or any drink. Uniquely decorated and feels like a living museum or a an antique store. Friendly staff!

title: Nice
text: Definitely take the city tram and do the whole loop to get an overview of Melbourne. Highly recommend!

title: Bad experience
text: Salmon was over cooked! Rocket salad was not fresh, sautéed vegetables were over cooked! Worse experience!

title: Excellent Massage
text: My husband and I both enjoyed our massage. The reception was very pleasant, the spa is a well equipped and professionally kept. We filled out a form first. The facilities were extra clean and the staff were experienced! We enjoyed our time and would go back if we are Hue. Highly recommend!

title: Excellent coffee and good dinner
text: We stayed in a hotel near by in Cam Nam. Most of the hotels do not offer espresso coffee. We came here for our morning coffee and decided to try dinner on our last evening. Food was delicious, I had fillet fish in the banana leaf and ginger mojito was excellent! Highly recommend.

title: Lovely evening with lovely Jazz music
text: Tucked in not a popular place. Excellent music by young musicians...a pianist, a guitarist, a flutist and a Erhu player at Guitar Hawaii! Unbelievably superb!
place: Guitar Hawaii Hoi An Live Music Bar

title: Must See
text: Don’t leave Hue without visiting The Citadel, it’s magnificent! You need at three hours to appreciate the beauty and enjoy your time.

title: Excellent Choice
text: We had airport pick up, tour Hue visiting Minh Mang Tomb, Khai Dinh Tomb, Thien Mu Pagoda, a boat ride on the perfumed River, excellent lunch and a visit to the Citadel. And the next day, travel from Hue to Hoi An stopping at the fishing village, Hai Van Pass, the Largest Buddah and Marble Mountain. The whole package was very nicely and professionally organized by Stop & Go Tours. Our tour guide Ms. Nhu was very pleasant with lots of information and excellent English knowledge. Our Driver/tour guide, Mr Trung was excellent. Highly recommend this group. Thank you!

title: 3 day 2 night relaxing Cruise
text: Even with the weather being not too good, we had a wonderful and relaxing time The service was outstanding, the food was excellent, very accommodating and friendly staff. Highly recommend this cruise.

title: Turkish meal
text: Excellent meze, mixed grill and delicious dessert. One of the non smoking restaurants. Staff were down to earth. Good food and good service

title: Lively and convenient
text: We had dinner after our hike. Big portion, good salad and friendly staff, reasonably priced and lively ambiance.

title: Best Wine Bar
text: Good choice of wince and great selection of cheese, meat, nuts and fruit platter. Knowledgeable staff and great ambiance.

title: Family friendly Restaurant
text: Good food, wine all freshly prepared ....and friendly staff. Nice place for kids to run around away form cars and traffic.

title: Street food
text: In cold weather anything warm tastes good. Walking along the old town of Sarajevo, you cant miss this!

title: Excellent Domestic Meal
text: All freshly prepared and tasteful food. Good food, drinks and friendly staff. Recommend this place for a meal.

title: Friendly staff
text: We stopped here for coffee on our way to Podgorica. It is quite rustic and looks like a good place to have a meal. Must try it next time!

title: Komovi Mountain Range
text: Another place where we did most was driving. Highly recommend to have a proper guide to take you around. There are lots of hikes from different direction with gorgeous views of the peaks.

title: Beautiful Drive and hikes
text: We drove most of the way, and did some short hikes but there is possibility of hiking along the way. It is beautiful! There is a new ski lift coming soon!

title: Stop and Visit
text: Very antique and beautifully painted walls of the icons in the Church and the chapel. Nice place to stop and have coffee, buy honey or any products at the Monastery.

title: Must-see
text: Walk around the lake, its beautiful and can be done on your own. Need a car to get there. ..very easy walk, just over an hour. Highly recommend

title: Excellent local food
text: We had a wonderful meal and great domestic wine. The service was good and it was nice sitting outside and enjoy the fresh air with great food and a drink. Highly recommend

title: Cute Little Pub
text: Amazing place to enjoy a drink. Local beer is brewed here and other kinds are available. Nice music too. No food is served. I wish it is smoke-free! Some customer friendly attitude is needed here, but still my favorite!

title: Good food good Service
text: We went to eat at the restaurant. Very simple and friendly atmosphere. The waiter was friendly and was very helpful to suggest what to order. We had a lamb dish, was very tasty, juicy and tender. We enjoyed our dinner and highly recommend.

title: Our favorite Restaurant
text: Excellent choice of food, friendly staff to enjoy a dinner with drinks and excellent choice of music. Very unique place...highly recommend!

title: Good Hike
text: The hike is quite challenging but doable and fun. If you are new to hiking, recommend you hire a guide.

title: Fun thing to do after long hikes
text: Take the Chair lift to Savin kuk and hike about 30 min. It is very easy to do this on your own. Lovely view of the Black lake form the summit.

title: Very easy hike
text: For this hike you will need a car. There aren't any proper signs but it is easy to figure it. Not a difficult hike.

title: Excellent
text: We had dinner with friends. Food was excellent......presentation, taste and most important excellent and friendly service. Highly recommend!

title: Incredible
text: Wow, quite sad to visit but if you really want to have a complete picture, it is worth it. Very well organized.

title: Incredible
text: You can visit Gallery in 2 days. If you go through each item it takes up a lot of time. Don't miss the videos. Very well done!

title: Meet Bosnia
text: We always take the free walking tours in any cities we visit. Nehad was very knowledgeable, attentive and fun. His mother met the group and offered us water before we started our tour and when we got back. It was a 3 hour tour, an overview of the old town Sarajevo which was quite interesting. We had a wonderful tour and highly recommend this tour to all first timers in Sarajevo! Dont forget to tip!

title: Lovely evening Ambiance
text: If you are looking for a quite evening, good food and friendly service, this is the place. If you are lucky you will get a chance to enjoy live jazz and excellent music too. Highly recommend

title: Great place for coffee and drinks
text: We come here quite often for coffee and evening drinks. Nice music, good service and great morning coffee!

title: Excellent Tours of Nepal, Tibet and Bhutan
text: Mr. Rajan was superb in helping us to design a special three-country tour to Nepal, Tibet and Bhutan. We started in Nepal with some tours of Kathmandu and then went hiking to Poonhill, this place, that place and others. The hikes were great and Ramjee was a very conscientious and helpful guide. We flew back from Pokara, overnighted in Kathmandu and then flew to Tibet, another fabulous experience. We did not go hiking in Tibet, but had plenty of walking in temples and monasteries and great road trips, including the Everest Base Camp. The longest day was from Lo Tingri, crossing the border and then the nine hour drive to Kathmandu. Next we flew to Bhutan where we had another very capable and knowledgeable guide and driver to show us the beautiful country of Bhutan. Rajan took care of all the airline tickets, hotels or guest houses, visas, and the itinerary which was very done. We highly recommend Earthbound Expeditions and we will definitely use them again. Thank very much, Namaste!

title: Wow, Amazing Restaurant!
text: Our first meal in Bhutan, and it was delicious. We arrived Bhutan and drove directly to Thimpu. Our first stop was at this restaurant for lunch. Food was coming one at a time, the wonderful waitress kept saying...more coming! Whatever was served was excellent. Definitely recommend this place. Thanks!

title: Great and Enjoyable week in Tibet
text: We arrived Lhasa airport, which was surprisingly clean quite and well guarded! Pema our tour guide and Temba, our driver met as we exited the airport. Pema was there ready with the paper work making sure that we did everything as required. Pema was very knowledgeable, conscientious and very helpful. Every checkpoint, hotels, and restaurant he was always there before us to make sure all was in perfect order. We had a wonderful time and enjoyed ourselves. We highly recommend this company. Tuckcheche!

title: Great restaurant!
text: Very tasty food, typical Nepali and vegetarian food also available. Good cocktails, good music and very friendly staff. Highly recommend!

title: Fantastic restaurant
text: What a wonderful place. This was a medieval salt warehouse renovated to be a wonderful restaurant. Food was fantastic, excellent service and very pleasant ambiance. Mali Ston by itself is a gem. Highly recommend.

title: Excellent Family Hotel
text: We stayed here for two nights. Rooms were nice comfortable and clean. Lovely and friendly staff. Excellent food at the restaurant, good ambiance and good service. One way airport transfer was free. Close to the airport and lovely village near-by....Aalasmeer. We spent our first day walking to the village and visit the Wind mill lion, then to the historic green house and just walking around the village was just awesome. Next day we went to the Royal Flora Holland..wow! what an experience. An incredible visit, you see a live auction if you are there early enough, fast flower delivery of carts of variety of flowers. We enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this place especially if you have been to Amsterdam many times!

title: Amazing Visit
text: If you are staying in Amsterdam or around, definitely take this tour. What an experience. Make sure you are there early enough to see a live auction!

title: Very interesting
text: Still in use Wind mill. Make sure you go inside and wait for a tour. If is very interesting and worth the visit. You can buy flour etc.. if you are interested!

title: Amazing
text: Historic Greenhouse ..want an amazing place. It was a very interesting visit. Lots of different species of plants, flowers and herbs. We were very impressed. I am sure in the summer time it must be gorgeous! Definitely recommend a visit!

title: Awesome
text: Excellent and tasty oriental fusion, nice ambiance. Good drinks and lovely, friendly staff. Good selection of music!

title: Must See
text: You need good walking shoes. This is huge complex and there is a lot of walking. Excellent views and very impressive. We didnt get to see the the war museum, it was closed. Its an amazing place...highly recommend.

title: Amazing Hotel and Restaurant
text: Our first Albanian meal, nicely presented and very delicious even as a vegetarian. We just had mezza which was just satisfying didn't have to continue with the main course. Great vine and excellent atmosphere. We also stayed one night. The hotel was very comfortable and cozy. Excellent breakfast and friendly staff. Highly recommend!

title: Amazing experience
text: We took the double Decker bus and walk around the Plaze de la Revolucion. We went to the top and the views were amazing. Nice day to visit, lots of photos to take and excellent views. Must Visit

title: Awesome!
text: We stayed in Havana in five different places, twice in the old town, once not far from the Ingleterra Hotel and twice in Malecon area and we enjoyed all and always went back to the old town. Just walking around the old town never got boring. Make sure you take a Free walking tour and visit all the hot spots! Its safe and fun, people are wonderful and friendly!

title: Antique place
text: We stayed one night. The hotel was very comfortable, spotless and warm...very antique with a character. We were lucky to have a meal, dinner and breakfast. Excellent domestic cuisine. Friendly and caring staff. Highly recommend

title: Incredible
text: Wow, quite sad to visit but if you really want to have a complete picture, it is worth it. Very well organized.

title: Incredible
text: You can visit Gallery in 2 days. If you go through each item it takes up a lot of time. Don't miss the videos. Very well done!

text: We always take the free walking tours in any cities we visit. Nehad was very knowledgeable, attentive and fun. His mother met the group and offered us water before we started our tour and when we got back. It was a 3 hour tour, an overview of the old town Sarajevo which was quite interesting. We had a wonderful tour and highly recommend this tour to all first timers in Sarajevo! Dont forget to tip!

title: Lovely evening Ambiance
text: If you are looking for a quite evening, good food and friendly service, this is the place. If you are lucky you will get a chance to enjoy live jazz and excellent music too. Highly recommend

title: Great place for coffee and drinks
text: We come here quite often for coffee and evening drinks. Nice music, good service and great morning coffee!

text: We stayed in Havana in five different places, twice in the old town, once not far from the Ingleterra Hotel and twice in Malecon area and we enjoyed all and always went back to the old town. Just walking around the old town never got boring. Make sure you take a Free walking tour and visit all the hot spots! Its safe and fun, people are wonderful and friendly!

title: Antique place
text: We stayed one night. The hotel was very comfortable, spotless and warm...very antique with a character. We were lucky to have a meal, dinner and breakfast. Excellent domestic cuisine. Friendly and caring staff. Highly recommend

title: Excellent food
text:
We stayed at the same hotel and the domestic cuisine was excellent. Great selection of mezza and organic fresh selection.
Highly recommend.

title: Amazing visit
text: Take a guide, worth it! An amazing living castle. People still live here, beautiful houses, businesses, souvenir shops, ruins, mosques etc. Beautiful view of the city. highly recommend!

title: Memorable Stay
text: We stayed at Hotel Kodra for New Year's Eve. There was a special family NYE celebration for the family of the owner and were included. We had wonderful time, with excellent selection of food, drink and music. We stayed for 3 nights and had a suite. It was very nice, comfortable and cozy. Excellent views, even in bad weather. Beautiful architecture and decor. WiFi and TV was excellent. Breakfast was excellent, all fresh and organic. The best were the staff, they all made feel so comfortable like part of the family. We highly recommend this hotel and restaurant and time of the year!

title: Best Restaurant
text: We enjoyed all the meals we had during our stay at this hotel. Everything was properly prepared tasteful and delicious

title: Lebanese Food In Cuba!
text: What a treat to find middle Eastern food in Havana, felt like home! Excellent Mezza, Tahini, Bababganou, Grape wine wraps, Falafel, Kibbeh and pita bread! Excellent Shish taouk, Chicken Shawarma etc.....After eating Cuban food for over two weeks, this was a big difference. Food had taste with proper seasonings. The owner and waiters are friendly and very welcoming. Reasonable prices. Highly recommend!

title: Good Selection
text:
Tasty Cuban cuisine... excellent seafood selection. Nice ambiance for a group. Good cocktails Friendly people.
Recommended.
place: El Rum Rum de la Habana

title: Great Connection
text:
We have been taking KLM for quite sometime, and this last one one was excellent even though the airport staff in Havana were not experience, they did their best to get all the passengers check in for departure. The airplane did not have very good media system but we needed to sleep anyway so it was not a big deal. Meals are good, however Special meals needs some attention.

All in all it was very satisfactory!

title: A nice way to see Stockholm
text: The tour is quite long. However with a good weather it is work it. A very good way to see Stockholm differently. We were very lucky with the weather.
place: Stromma Hop On - Hop Off Boat

title: Highly recommend this museum
text: We had only 2-1/2 hours and still could not finish. It is a wonderful museum, lots to see and do and worth every minute. Highly recommend!

title: A weekend Visit
text: This is an incredible building. We enjoyed our visit with the tour guide that is provided. There are groups according to languages. A must see place!

title: Great Music
text: Nice atmosphere, great music at Gamla Stan. Make sure you go early to get a seat. We had a wonderful evening and definitely recommend.

title: Great Tour
text: IF you want to know about a city, take this tour! It gives you all the highlights and you walk. Its free but you must tip! Highly recommend!

title: Good Hike
text: We did an hour down and came back. There are lots of hikes around and lots to do, so if you have the time you can hike longer. Highly recommend.

title: As always great way to know a City
text: With only one day in Vancouver we were able to do 2 tours with Bryan! He was very informative and answered all our questions. As we have experienced in past this is the best way to get an overview of any city, we will definitely come back! Highly recommend free walking tours.

title: Refreshing and good food
text: After the visit to Blagaj it was Restoran Vrelo was perfect place to relax and enjoy good trout. Service was excellent! Highly recommend.

title: Excellent tour with Milo
text: It was a good overview of Meddellin. A perfect tour to do as soon as soon as you arrive. Comfortable shoes recommended. Remember to register!
place: Real City Tours The Walking Tours

title: Excellent
text: The chef and the staff were friendly and welcoming. We had the most delicious food -- grilled salmon and vegetables; and mashed potatoes. The desert was also delicious. We really enjoyed the food. Highly recommend this place?

title: Nice beach
text: Very long walk, hot and no shade at the beach. We did not see any animals. After reading recommendations and blogs we were expecting to see more animals. And we're quite disappointed. But nice beach!

title: Excellent vegetarian meal
text: What a cute little place. They were starting with grilling and we were hopping that they would have vegetarian which is quite difficult to find and what a surprise! Very simple, just boiled and real potatoes mashed. Friendly staff especially the temporary staff from Switzerland. Highly recommend this restaurant, if you a meat lover you will not be sorry!

title: Great location, friendly owner and staff
text: Great location, warm shower and spacious room. Breakfast is very basic but there so many places to go to around. Very helpful and friendly staff. Beautiful top floor for breakfast or just hanging around with beautiful views. Highly recommend.....Good value!
